title: Women Are The C.E.O.'s Of The Family
itunes:title: Women Are The C.E.O.'s Of The Family
description:
The Breakfast Club talks are important women are to the family.  Charlamagne Tha God gives Donkey of the Day to Corrine Terrone, a teacher being caught on camera using racial slurs in front of her young children while going on a rant at the grocery store.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
